title: Emerald Blossom Diamond Haaram with Jhumka Set
materials: South Sea Pearls. Features meticulous Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster and shine.
features: This exquisite set showcases a contemporary take on the traditional Haaram. The necklace is crafted with intricate diamond latticework interspersed with emerald accents. The central pendant features a ruby centerpiece surrounded by diamonds and dangling South Sea pearls. Matching Jhumka earrings echo the floral motif and complete the set with graceful movement. The setting is a masterful blend of prong and pave, ensuring each gemstone's brilliance is maximized.
colors: and iridescent White (Pearls). A classic and auspicious South Indian color palette.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Equally stunning for modern cocktail parties and formal events. A treasured heirloom piece.
description: A dazzling fusion of tradition and contemporary design. The use of high-quality diamonds, emeralds, rubies, and South Sea pearls ensures lasting beauty and value. The Hyderabadi polish provides a superior finish and exceptional durability. This set is a statement piece that will elevate any attire and become a cherished family heirloom. The exquisite floral design symbolizes prosperity and new beginnings.
